properties.entry: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( REVIEW_NO, CONTENT, INSERT_DATE, SPACE_NO, USER_NO ) VALUES( SEQ_RVNO.NEXTVAL, ?, SYSDATE, ?, ? )
SELECT REVIEW_NO, CONTENT, USER_NAME, INSERT_DATE, R.USER_NO FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.USER_NO=M.USER_NO) JOIN SPACE S ON (S.SPACE_NO=R.SPACE_NO) WHERE S.SPACE_NO = ?
